alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Frederick; Northern Fauquier; Page; Rappahannock; Shenandoah; Warren; Western Loudoun (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued March 30 at 3:40AM EDT until March 30 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 32 expected. * WHERE...In Maryland, Northwest Montgomery and Northwest Howard Counties. In Virginia, Shenandoah, Frederick VA, Page, Warren, Clarke, Rappahannock, Northern Fauquier and Western Loudoun Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Clarke; Frederick; Northern Fauquier; Page; Rappahannock; Shenandoah; Warren; Western Loudoun
